verbs.description: I [V: was] reading the news yesterday , and I came across an article from Fox News which mentioned Michael Avenatti ’s name . Mr. Avenatti of course is the attorney representing Stormy Daniels , a.k.a , Stephanie Clifford , in her lawsuit against Donald J. Trump ...
